moments.context: START: Mid-4th quarter, Ray Rice's 2-yard TD run cuts Louisville's lead to 25-23 (Rutgers fails 2pt conversion).

moments.context: END: Kicker Jeremy Ito makes the 28-yard field goal, putting Rutgers ahead 28-25 with 13 seconds left. Rutgers holds on for the win.
